name: The Road to Longka,
description:
"The building the causeway bridge" begins when Rama convenes a council of war after having led his monkey army from the cities of Kheedkhin and Chompoo to their encampment on the shore opposite Longka City

  • The Fine Arts Department of Thailand, under the Ministry of Culture.
  • College of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology Student Team
  • Developer via Daydev Co., Ltd.

Remark: This game provide in Thai Language
